subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
Trust this email meets you very well.
Once again, my name is William Morris, Director of Investments at Weatherbys Private Bank, UK.
Please did you get my letter on the interesting proposed offer I sent you?
Please kindly revert to me so we can proceed and close out accordingly.
Thank you in anticipation of a positive response.
Yours Sincerely,
William Morris.
wm9597775@gmail.com

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello William Morris,

I hope this message finds you in good health. I appreciate your email and the time you've taken to reach out to me.

I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the details of your letter. Could you please elaborate more on the proposed offer? What exactly does it entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Cindy
